name: DreamscapesSleepSounds
0:
”Alexa, open dreamscapes sleep sounds”
”Alexa, play rain sounds”
”Alexa, play thunderstorm sounds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: dreamscapes sleep sounds
des: Dreamscapes offers a serene auditory escape with a variety of soothing soundscapes, from the gentle patter of rain and the calming rhythm of ocean waves to the soft whispers of a forest at dusk. Perfectly crafted to aid relaxation, reduce stress, and promote deep sleep, this skill transforms your environment into a haven of tranquility, helping you unwind and drift off into a peaceful slumber. Whether you need a moment of calm during the day or a soothing background for a restful night, Dreamscapes is your go-to companion for creating a restorative and peaceful atmosphere.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
